CompliantsDataDetails.CompliantsInfoURL: Financial Conduct Authority rules require us to provide them with a report of our complaints data every six months. In certain cirmcumstances we are also required to publish a summary of our complaints data. The most recent summary is avaialble at https://www.bankofireland.com/about-bank-of-ireland/about-the-group/customer-commitment/complaint-management-at-bank-of-ireland/
CompliantsDataDetails.OmbudsmanURL: The Financial Ombudsman Service publishes its complaints data every six months. You can see their complaints data about us at www.ombudsman-complaints-data.org.uk/
